template.name: MySQL_Multi
template.description: Custom Template to gather data from multiple MySQL instances on a single host.

trigger_prototype.name: Connection Threads on {#MYSQLPORT}, {HOST.NAME} are greater than 50
Connection Threads on {#MYSQLPORT}, {HOST.NAME} are greater than 100
Running Threads on {MYSQLPORT}, {HOST.NAME} are greater than 50
Running Threads on {MYSQLPORT}, {HOST.NAME} are greater than 100.
Temp disk tables on {#MYSQLPORT}, {HOST.NAME} are greater than 6000
Tmp disk tables on {#MYSQLPORT}, {HOST.NAME} is more than 10000
